LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="ab28415df5e44a058420a7080588658d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Thank you for saving me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf10"/]Kit[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ab28415df5e44a058420a7080588658d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I spend most of my time investigating
minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's what I came here
to do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ab28415df5e44a058420a7080588658d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The minerals on this planet are AMAZING![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's got so many different kinds of
minerals that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ab28415df5e44a058420a7080588658d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sorry![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I started to get carried
away there.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ab28415df5e44a058420a7080588658d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The important thing is that you know how
much I appreciate you rescuing me.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="5dbd7c2a442f445697f6200d5197ac8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My job is all about investigating what
different mineral resources are made up
of and neat things like that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5dbd7c2a442f445697f6200d5197ac8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The resources I've found on this planet are
exceptional![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did you know the purity of the
minerals in the ground here is...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5dbd7c2a442f445697f6200d5197ac8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]Oh pebbles![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I almost got carried away
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My apologies.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="bf716d5c929b4cdba741b13055bbf424" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I like all minerals,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I think iron ore is the
most interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf716d5c929b4cdba741b13055bbf424" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Quality iron ore is typically made up of
more than 50 percent iron.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf716d5c929b4cdba741b13055bbf424" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Did you know there are also iron oxides
composed of oxygen and iron,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] many of
which occur in nature?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Like hematite!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="e663fb2291a54e819c4ce0d33eacc269" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Investigating minerals might seem quite
simple,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it can be difficult work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e663fb2291a54e819c4ce0d33eacc269" Scale="1"/]Sometimes my investigations take me into
old mines and ruins.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've even gotten
caught in a few cave-ins.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e663fb2291a54e819c4ce0d33eacc269" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]But every once in a while you find rocks
composed of minerals you've never seen
before in the rubble of a cave-in!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="24ad46168fd640cda364edaf66b2584f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Poppin' pumice![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did I tell you about what I
found here?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a beautiful ore that
shimmers in all the colors of the rainbow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="24ad46168fd640cda364edaf66b2584f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]It cracked a bit when I fell to the surface
though.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That surprised me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I honestly
expected an ore to be more resilient.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="24ad46168fd640cda364edaf66b2584f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Still,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this planet showed me something I
had never seen before.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Isn't that amazing!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="5514f10ba87e44babf9a60cddc4d369a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I don't just investigate mineralsâ€”I'm also
researching at the same university as [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal15"/]Osa[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5514f10ba87e44babf9a60cddc4d369a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal15"/]Osa[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] brings so much energy to everything
he does.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Though,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] his boisterous manner
can be a bit exhausting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5514f10ba87e44babf9a60cddc4d369a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh stones![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You know that last bit's just
between us,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="2c2c31f37658499cbb128c56d2a94c38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm actually [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal15"/]Osa[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s junior.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's thanks to him
that I'm even part of the task force.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c2c31f37658499cbb128c56d2a94c38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]He gave me the push I needed when I was
undecided about whether or not I should
join.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm glad he did.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="590307d15db7415da41f23875b4317cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I spent some time investigating the
raw materials that everyone in the
Rescue Corps is using.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="590307d15db7415da41f23875b4317cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]What I discovered is that they're not really
minerals but a highly pure conglomeration
of fossilized creature remains.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="590307d15db7415da41f23875b4317cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Could this be a mechanism unique to
this planet or perhaps a secret of some
unknown life-form?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's quite fascinating!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="aed0071a72354e369c6272694790bbd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I've often been told that I'm too slow to
submit my research papers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aed0071a72354e369c6272694790bbd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But I feel like the hypotheses and
verification process is really important.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aed0071a72354e369c6272694790bbd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Others like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal15"/]Osa[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] submit them so quickly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need to be exhaustive about
verifying BEFORE I submit my papers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aed0071a72354e369c6272694790bbd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Granite...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I mean...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]granted,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I was
lost and couldn't move,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized that
momentum can also be very important.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="8f037fe47b2f4744beeb94e867abc927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My job is all about investigating what
different mineral resources are made up
of and neat things like that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f037fe47b2f4744beeb94e867abc927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The resources I've found on this planet are
exceptional![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did you know the purity of the
minerals in the ground here is...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f037fe47b2f4744beeb94e867abc927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]Oh pebbles![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I almost got carried away
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My apologies.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="e822dcf6cca74219911a3402ec62fe06" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I like all minerals,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I think iron ore is the
most interesting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e822dcf6cca74219911a3402ec62fe06" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Quality iron ore is typically made up of
more than 50 percent iron.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e822dcf6cca74219911a3402ec62fe06" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Did you know there are also iron oxides
composed of oxygen and iron,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] many of
which occur in nature?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Like hematite!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="0a290648c5574788baddb34901e95d11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Investigating minerals might seem quite
simple,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it can be difficult work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0a290648c5574788baddb34901e95d11" Scale="1"/]Sometimes my investigations take me into
old mines and ruins.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've even gotten
caught in a few cave-ins.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0a290648c5574788baddb34901e95d11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]But every once in a while you find rocks
composed of minerals you've never seen
before in the rubble of a cave-in!
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="ca7e1f62d45344c5864d2a1802b99157" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how beautiful...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Your eyes are as
bright and shiny as a deposit of pyrite.
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="6ad1a241adfe41bc86228278b7712d5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]The texture of your skin is as smooth
as pure clay.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ad1a241adfe41bc86228278b7712d5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Would you mind if I scratched behind
your ears?
LF009.LF009_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf10"/][UE:Meta key="fe24a599a149423b84133b499c7334e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Lapis lazuli![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's the face of someone
who really likes minerals![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe24a599a149423b84133b499c7334e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I have a feeling you and I would get along.
